author: William Horobin
title: French President Says He Urged Trump to Make Limited Strikes
text:
PARIS—French President Emmanuel Macron said Sunday he persuaded his U.S. counterpart, Donald Trump, to remain engaged in Syria and to limit airstrikes to chemical-weapons targets.
“Ten days ago, President Trump said the U.S. should disengage from Syria. We convinced him it was necessary to remain there,” Mr. Macron said in a television interview Sunday. “Secondly, we convinced [Mr. Trump] that the strikes should be limited to chemical weapons.”
